      • setStep

        public void setStep(StepReturn sr,
                    java.lang.String StepName,
                    java.lang.String StepDescription,
                    boolean AbortOnFail,
                    java.lang.String screenCapturePath)
        Report a step after his end.
        Parameters:
        sr - StepReturn, with state and error
        StepName - Name of step from Excel
        StepDescription - Description of step from Excel
        Identifier - WebElement name from Excel
        Action - Action done by step from Excel
        Data - Data used by step from Excel
        AbortOnFail - if test stop when StepReturn is fail
